name: You Are the Horror
description:
[KNOWN ISSUE] Camera is too far zoomed in on player character. Will be fixed in a future build.

You Are the Horror - a silly endless eater game, where YOU are the horrible terrible monster who must eat the annoying ghost hunters running amuck in your house! How far can you get before the light of their flashlights burn you?

WASD to move, SPACE to jump. E to Eat and Q to Hide behind objects.

Made for the  MECA&D AG 250 Fall 2022 Game Jam
